hero.title: Trusted Project Cargo Partner
hero.subtitle: At Haixun, we excel in providing customized logistics solutions for project cargo, ensuring client deadlines and requirements are met with precision.
hero.description: With expertise in handling oversized and sensitive shipments, we have successfully served clients such as Caterpillar China, electric car exporters, and construction companies.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive logistics solutions tailored to your needs

lcl.title: LCL Services
lcl.description: HAIXUN operates its own consolidation services on multiple trade routes, providing complete transparency in pricing across origin, destination, and ocean freight charges.
lcl.fullDescription: HAIXUN offers its own consolidation service on numerous trade routes, leveraging an extensive network of consolidators. This enables the company to deliver competitive pricing and a range of sailing options. By regularly providing consolidation boxes to key trade lanes, HAIXUN can effectively handle cargo that requires timely deliveries.

cfs.title: CFS Services
cfs.description: Container Freight Station services providing efficient cargo handling, consolidation, and deconsolidation with advanced warehouse management systems.
cfs.fullDescription: Our CFS facilities are equipped with modern infrastructure to handle cargo stuffing, destuffing, palletization, and storage. We ensure secure and efficient operations with real-time inventory tracking.

fcl.title: FCL Services
fcl.description: HAIXUN owns a fleet of containers, including special equipment to accommodate customers' unique requirements, specializing in multiple global trade lanes.
fcl.fullDescription: When it comes to container shipping, FCL (Full Container Load) is the most cost-effective and efficient option. We handle every stage meticulously, from negotiating contract prices with carriers to final delivery to the consignee.

warehouse.title: Warehouse Management
warehouse.description: Equipped with state-of-the-art facilities, HAIXUN efficiently manages warehousing operations for various commodities, including cold storage with advanced technology.
warehouse.fullDescription: HAIXUN possesses the necessary resources and expertise to effectively manage the warehousing of diverse commodities, including cold storage facilities. Our warehouse management optimizes operations for enhanced profitability and customer satisfaction.

projectCargo.title: Project Cargo
projectCargo.description: Specialized handling of oversized, heavy-lift, and complex project cargo with customized logistics solutions from port-to-port or door-to-door.
projectCargo.fullDescription: We operate a specialized division focused on knowledge-based projects, staffed with highly skilled experts. HAIXUN is fully equipped to handle challenging project cargoes, including long lengths, oversized dimensions, and heavy lifts that require floating cranes or tandem lifting.

project.title: Project Logistics
project.description: With a dedicated project division comprising industry experts, HAIXUN ensures the safe and timely handling of complex, large-scale project cargo.

air.title: Air Freight
air.description: Swift and reliable air cargo solutions connecting your business to global markets with express delivery options and real-time tracking.
air.fullDescription: HAIXUN excels in offering enhanced flexibility and global choice by collaborating with specialized carriers. We provide customized sea-air and air-sea options, tailored to meet customers' deadlines while achieving significant cost savings.

oceanFreight.title: Ocean Freight
oceanFreight.description: Cost-effective sea cargo services with FCL and LCL options, competitive rates, and reliable scheduling for global trade routes.
oceanFreight.fullDescription: HAIXUN possesses its own fleet of containers, including specialized equipment. With extensive expertise in sea freight operations, we excel in various trade lanes, securing favorable rates and guaranteeing space, allocation, timing, and pricing.

customs.title: Customs Clearance
customs.description: As a leading customs clearing agent, HAIXUN ensures smooth and efficient completion of all customs formalities and inspections with minimal delays.
customs.fullDescription: Professional customs brokerage services handling documentation, duty calculations, and regulatory compliance. Our experienced team ensures fast clearance with full regulatory adherence.

oog.title: OOG Shipments
oog.description: Services offered include cargo loading, lashing, survey arrangements, and inter-island movement to major portsâ€”handled by a team experienced in out-of-gauge cargo.

import.title: Import Services
import.description: Comprehensive import handling services supported by warehouses, yards, cranes, and advanced container handling equipment ensure seamless operations.

consolidation.title: Cargo Consolidation
consolidation.description: Direct export consolidations to key destinations such as Singapore, Colombo, and Karachi, with extended connections to major global hubs.
consolidation.fullDescription: HAIXUN's cargo consolidation allows multiple shippers to share container space and reduce freight costs, with end-to-end tracking and full transparency throughout the shipping process.

liquidCargo.title: Liquid Cargo Transportation
liquidCargo.description: Specialized transportation solutions for liquid cargo through ISO Tanks, Flexi Tanks, and IBCs with safety compliance and real-time monitoring.
liquidCargo.fullDescription: HAIXUN specializes in delivering comprehensive expertise for liquid cargo transportation. Our priority is to offer professional, cost-effective, and secure solutions with efficient logistics management for seamless door-to-door movements.

thirdPartyLogistics.title: 3PL Services
thirdPartyLogistics.description: Advanced third-party logistics solutions with cutting-edge warehouse management systems for optimized fulfillment and reduced costs.
thirdPartyLogistics.fullDescription: With our cutting-edge 3PL warehouse management system, optimize your business operations and implement advanced fulfillment strategies for enhanced customer satisfaction, while minimizing expenses and delivery times.

linerAgency.title: Liner Agency
linerAgency.description: End-to-end services for shipping lines including vessel scheduling, cargo handling, documentation, and port operations coordination.
linerAgency.fullDescription: HAIXUN offers full liner agency support including vessel scheduling, documentation, customs clearance, cargo booking, and port coordination with professional service standards.

about.title: About Haixun Global
about.subtitle: 30+ Years of Logistics Excellence
about.paragraph1: Haixun Global Shenzhen, leverages over 30 years of expertise in logistics, including sea, land, air transportation, customs declaration, warehousing, and distribution. The Group has expanded its network to regions such as China, India, Malaysia, the UAE, and beyond.
about.paragraph2: Established in 2019, Haixun Global Shenzhen upholds the Group's commitment to integrity, customer satisfaction, and rapid response, ensuring a reliable and customer-focused service experience in China.
about.paragraph3: Our services include tailored shipping plans with the selection of appropriate transport modes and equipment, such as Flat Rack, Open Top Containers, and Breakbulk Shipping. Focused on punctuality and cost-efficiency, we guarantee safe and on-time deliveries.

advantages.title: Our Advantages
advantages.subtitle: Delivering excellence through capacity, service, and expertise

transportation.title: Transportation Capacity
transportation.description: With a registered capital of 50 million yuan, the company has Jiefang, Dongfeng and Isuzu light format transportation vehicles, which are engaged in cargo transportation services all over the country.

logistics.title: Logistics Service
logistics.description: The company has advanced information system, which can be seen in the whole process, so that you can master the progress of each business at any time, and strict system prevents errors and accidents.

team.title: Team Personnel
team.description: The company has a highly competitive operation team, has been engaged in domestic cargo transportation services for many years, and has a rigorous transportation organization team.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Need to get in touch? No problem! You can use our contact form to send us a message.

footer.description: Leveraging over 30 years of expertise in logistics, including sea, land, air transportation, customs declaration, warehousing, and distribution.
